description: Vrrroooommm!!!  DJ is having a KILLER time hangin' with his buddy Brent Biscayne.  Who wouldn't though?? He hopes Brent has noticed, but doesn't wanna be too obvious about it.Believe it or not, Brent has noticed the erection that's been rubbing on his ass. Well DJ is more than happy to accommodate, as long as Brent is willing to fuck his tight ass too, right there on the 4-wheeler!  It sure is easy to get dirty out here on the farm. Enjoy!
title: Brent Biscayne & DJ
